GeneralInformation.History:
Established in 2009, Istanbul Medipol University is the most preferred choice of students and nurtures the success of its students through advanced infrastructure and distinguished faculty members.
Istanbul Medipol University fosters a dynamic global research environment through innovative teaching led by accomplished academicians. Providing essential knowledge and skills, our faculty members ensure students are well-prepared for real-world challenges. Education is enhanced by advanced technologies, offering access to multimedia libraries and modern facilities.

Divisions.Details: Istanbul Medipol University fine arts education philosophy has been built upon a high-quality education level that combines our infinitive cultural heritage with artistic creativity accompanied by advanced knowledge.
Founded in 2015, School of Education offers five different undergraduate programs.  The major aim of the School is to train teachers and educators qualified to teach at every educational levels.
Due to the needs and expectations of the everchanging world, each program is being revised periodically and lifelong Education concept is always taken into consideration.

Divisions.College: School of Humanities and Social Sciences
Divisions.Details: The programmes have been designed to connect students with the society as well as public and private sector for employment opportunities.
